remarks: A homomorphism of non-unital rings preserves multiplication. (Contributed by AV, 23-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rnghmmul.x $e |- X = ( Base ` R ) $.
rnghmmul.m $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
rnghmmul.n $e |- .X. = ( .r ` S ) $.
rnghmmul $p |- ( ( F e. ( R RngHomo S ) /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( F ` ( A .x. B ) ) = ( ( F ` A ) .X. ( F ` B ) ) ) $.
